questions.question: There are two type of atomic functions and they are _____,_______

explanations.a: wait() is correct but ready isnt an atomic function

questions.question: Wait() does _____and signal() does _____ for the semaphore

answers.a: In the bounded buffer both the producer and consumer can not run at the same time.
answers.b: In the bounded buffer both the producer and consumer can run at the same time.
answers.c: Producer cannot fill slots if all slots are filled
answers.d: Consumer should not be able to empty if all the slots are empty
